source.59774b69:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline
from matplotlib import rcParams 
import seaborn as sns

def matplotlib_config():
    rcParams['font.family'] = 'sans-serif'
    rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = \
            ['Hiragino Maru Gothic Pro', 'Yu Gothic', 'Meirio', 'Takao', 'IPAexGothic', 'IPAPGothic', 'VL PGothic', 'Noto Sans CJK JP']
    rcParams['figure.figsize'] = 12, 8
    rcParams["font.size"] = 12

matplotlib_config()
source.fbcb55a8:
df_train = pd.read_csv('../input/titanic/train.csv')
df_test = pd.read_csv('../input/titanic/test.csv')

df = df_train.copy()
df_train.head()

source.71040a2c:
fig, (ax1, ax2) = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(24, 8))
_ = sns.barplot(x='Embarked', y='Survived', data=df, ax=ax1)
_ = sns.countplot(x='Embarked', hue='Survived', data=df)
source.e54256e3:
fig, (ax1, ax2) = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(24, 8))
_ = sns.barplot(x='Sex', y='Survived', data=df, ax=ax1)
_ = sns.countplot(x='Sex', hue='Survived', data=df, ax=ax2)
source.587402f1:
bins = (0, 5, 12, 18, 35, 60, 120, 200)
group_names = ('Baby', 'Child', 'Teenager', 'Young Adult', 'Adult', 'Senior', 'Unknown')
df['AgeGroup'] = pd.cut(df['Age'].fillna(130), bins, labels=group_names)

fig, (ax1, ax2) = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(24, 8))
_ = sns.barplot(x='AgeGroup', y='Survived', data=df, ax=ax1)
_ = sns.barplot(x='AgeGroup', y='Survived', hue='Sex', data=df, ax=ax2)
source.4feb09c3:
df['FamilySize'] = df['Parch'] + df['SibSp'] + 1

fig, (ax1, ax2) = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(24, 8))
_ = sns.barplot(x='FamilySize', y='Survived', data=df, ax=ax1)
_ = ax1.set_xlim([-1, 7])
_ = sns.countplot(x='FamilySize', hue='Survived', data=df, ax=ax2)
source.06a39694:
bins = (0.5, 1.5, 2.5, 100)
group_names = ('Single', 'Couple', 'Family')
df['FamilyType'] = pd.cut(df['FamilySize'], bins, labels=group_names)

fig, (ax1, ax2) = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(24, 8))
_ = sns.barplot(x='FamilyType', y='Survived', data=df, ax=ax1)
_ = sns.countplot(x='FamilyType', hue='Survived', data=df, ax=ax2)
source.e3a78691:
fig, (ax1, ax2) = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(24, 8))
_ = sns.barplot(x='Pclass', y='Survived', data=df, ax=ax1)
_ = sns.pointplot(x='Pclass', y='Survived', hue='Sex', data=df, ax=ax2,
                  palette={'male':'blue', "female":'red'},
                  markers=['*', 'o'], linestyles=['-', '--'])
source.ee2ce774:
df['CabinSection'] = df['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown').map(lambda x: x[0])

fig, (ax1, ax2) = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(24, 8))
_ = sns.barplot(x='CabinSection', y='Survived', data=df, ax=ax1)
_ = sns.countplot(x='CabinSection', hue='Survived', data=df, ax=ax2)
